oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Badoux, Emanuel F., 1925 May 06
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An authenticated copy of the will of Emanuel F. Badoux, “of the City of Columbus, County of Franklin, and State of Ohio,” dated March 23rd, 1920, filed January 7th, 1925, Homer Z. Bostwick, Probate Judge. Illustrates the first page of the document. Badoux’ will was presented for probate to the Davidson County Court on May 6th 1925 “Recorded in Will Book 42, page 283.” Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Badoux family
